p: Environmental life cycle assessment (LCA) quantifies the environmental impacts of products, services, and organizations [ 55]. Life cycle assessment was conducted for the proposed VFAs’ recovery process using the life cycle inventory model [ 35]. Table 6 summarizes the assessment results in four different scores, in the best and worst scenarios. Compared to various bio-products and fatty acid processes, the proposed VFAs’ process gets 70% lower eco-scores. Life cycle assessment was limited to the recovery process operation, but it could be significantly improved when the VFA source became from harvested bio-feed to bio-waste. Further development of VFA recovery processes can help to change discarded bio-waste to eco-friendly resource.
